title: Tour de France Stage 16: Philipsen Pumels Everyone as Cavendish Misses Chance in Final Tour Sprint
content:
No fairytale finish for Cavendish in last Tour de France sprint before retirement, Girmay crashes in final to blow green jersey battle wide open.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 16: Philipsen Pumels Everyone as Cavendish Misses Chance in Final Tour Sprint on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
